txt.en: 'As I suspected, the crystals you collected are different from those we saw in Elderslade. We must uncover this new weaver of fell magic who has been enhancing the sarrowstones and using them to create these terrible beasts.\n\n'See if you can find the location where the Wargs are being enchanted. One of the scouts said she saw cages in the tiers above their dens. Search for anything that might help us discover who is behind these abominations. I will meet you in Hagbuth, on the upper tier across the river.'
A cage! You must be close!
Warg dens can be found in western Clovengap.\n\nMother Amma has asked for you search for clues around the Warg dens.

Mother Amma is in Hagbuth, in south-eastern Clovengap.\n\nYou found a fragment of torn paper and a journal detailing sarrowstones experiments. You should bring the journal and paper fragment to Mother Amma.
Someone has been experimenting on the Wargs of Clovengap and creating even more dangerous abominations.
Clues can be found in the upper tiers of south-west Clovengap.\n\nYou should continue to look for clues as to how the crystal-encrusted Wargs are being created.
DNT - You found torn fragment of paper
You found a torn fragment of paper
Clues can be found in the upper tiers of south-west Clovengap.\n\nYou should continue to look for clues as to how the crystal-encrusted Wargs are being created.
Clues can be found in the upper tiers of south-west Clovengap.\n\nYou should continue to look for clues as to how the crystal-encrusted Wargs are being created.
'Welcome back, friend. What have you discovered?'
The Angmarim camp is in south-west Clovengap.\n\nYou have discovered an Angmarim camp where a sorceress is conducting experiments on the local Wargs.
